trends: There have been no other sightings in Leshan
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis image was taken at a remote monastary in china.It is not serviced by any public utilities including electricity.The object was not noticed at the time by either myself or any one present.It is in southern China near a mountain named Emei Shan.I was an American student attending school in Shanghai and it was my habit to take pictures of interesting locations to send to my parents and family.After returning home my family was looking through the pictures and my step father noticed the object and asked if it was some sort of light fixture.After assuring him that there was not even electricy in this remote area we enlarged it to examine it more closely.It shows very interesting detail including what seems to be a puff of smoke directly above it and at higer magnification shows what seems to be atmospheric distortions above giving us the intuitive impression of downward motion.
Summary: Didn't notice object until after browsing through pictures.
